title: Updated New York Style TOP FLOOR one bedroom!
app_fee: 35.00 application fee (includes credit check and processing)
posting_body: Updated New York Style TOP FLOOR one bedroom apartment in the Heart of Uptown!

This apartment features original softwood floors, living room, bedroom, kitchen with newer appliances (including fridge, stove, microwave, dishwasher, disposal + IN UNIT W/D), farm style kitchen sink, subway tile back splash, and an attractive open concept kitchen , 3/4 bathroom (shower only) with endless on demand hot water.
The Wagner Apartment is located just 2 blocks to BART, restaurants, Fox Theatre, shops, and more!
ACE Garage (2 blocks away) has parking options starting at $260/mo, ask for more details.
This beautiful apartment is available now!
* One small pet negotiable, additional deposit required
Rental listings subject to change at any time.
